column3: 7:34. Monday morning, Blackeberg. The burglar alarm at the ICA grocery store on Arvid Morne's way is set off.

He made another entry in his logbook when Summers emerged from the building at 7:34, and set off in the direction of the local nick as his radio sprang to life. He listened carefully to what Paul had to report, and said heâ€™d deal with it as soon as he was back in the office.
